sentences.en: All that the tourists see are the externals of our faith.
sentences.cn: 游客们看到的只是我们信仰的表面情况。

sentences.en: an attempt to make us &B{break faith with} our customers.
sentences.cn: 让我们失信于顾客的企图。

sentences.en: He found comfort in Eva's blind faith in him.
sentences.cn: 伊娃对他的盲目信任让他感到宽慰。

sentences.en: He had implicit faith in the noble intentions of the Emperor.
sentences.cn: 他对皇帝陛下高尚的动机深信不疑。

sentences.en: How much faith should we put in anti-ageing products?
sentences.cn: 我们对抗衰老产品应该抱有多少信心？

sentences.en: I have great faith in you—I know you'll do well.
sentences.cn: 我对你有信心—我知道你会干好的。

sentences.en: If we don't, we're breaking faith with our people!
sentences.cn: 如果我们不这样，就是对我们的人民背信弃义！

sentences.en: In Poland, the faith has always meant more than mere religion.
sentences.cn: 在波兰，信仰的含义向来不仅仅指宗教。

sentences.en: Naivety bordering on obtuseness helped sustain his faith.
sentences.cn: 近乎鲁钝的天真使他坚守自己的信仰。

sentences.en: Non-violence and patience are the central tenets of their faith.
sentences.cn: 非暴力和忍耐是他们的信仰的核心原则。

sentences.en: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.cn: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.en: She had an unshakeable faith in human goodness and natural honesty.
sentences.cn: 她坚信人的本性是善良诚实的。

sentences.en: She had placed a great deal of faith in Mr Penleigh.
sentences.cn: 她对彭利先生极其信任。

sentences.en: The marriage signalled James's embrace of the Catholic faith.
sentences.cn: 这桩婚姻标志着詹姆斯皈依了天主教.

sentences.en: The ministers issued an affirmation of their faith in the system.
sentences.cn: 部长们表示了对该体制坚定的信心。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。
